law.text: The offices of the mine inspectors shall be at such places within their respective districts as the commissioner designates, and each mine inspector shall be provided with a suitable office.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 325, sec. 18, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 298, sec. 5. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 5, effective March 5, 1952. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739-6.
